data.title: Detroit Pistons Roster, Schedule, Stats (2008-2009)
data.meta_description: 2008-2009: Detroit Pistons roster and stats. Quick access to players bio, career stats and team records.
data.text:
2008-2009 - Points

Rodney Stuckey scores a season high 40 points for Detroit Pistons

On December 12, 2008, Rodney Stuckey set a season high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 40 points in Detroit Pistons's home win against Chicago Bulls, 104-98. He also had 2 rebounds, 4 assists, 4 steals and finished the game with a 36 efficiency.

2008-2009 - Rebounds

Antonio McDyess grabs a season high 22 rebounds for Detroit Pistons

On March 03, 2009, Antonio McDyess set a season high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 22 rebounds in Detroit Pistons's home loss against New York Knicks, 111-116. He also had 21 points, 2 assists and finished the game with a 36 efficiency.

2008-2009 - Assists

Richard Hamilton dishes a season high 16 assists for Detroit Pistons

On March 03, 2009, Richard Hamilton set a season high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 16 assists in Detroit Pistons's road win against Toronto Raptors, 95-99. He also had 24 points, 5 rebounds and finished the game with a 20 efficiency.

2008-2009 - Steals

Kwame Brown has a season high 5 steals for Detroit Pistons

On March 03, 2009, Kwame Brown set a season high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 5 steals in Detroit Pistons's home loss against Memphis Grizzlies, 84-89. He also had 6 points, 13 rebounds, 5 steals and finished the game with a 18 efficiency.

2008-2009 - Blocks

Jason Maxiell blocks a season high 6 blocks for Detroit Pistons Jason Maxiell

On November 11, 2008, Jason Maxiell set a season high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 6 blocks in Detroit Pistons's home win against Milwaukee Bucks, 107-97. He also had 13 points, 8 rebounds and finished the game with a 22 efficiency.

2008-2009 - Efficiency

Antonio McDyess set a season high 40 efficiency for Detroit Pistons

On March 03, 2009, Antonio McDyess set a season high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 40 efficiency in Detroit Pistons's home win against LA Clippers, 108-90. He also had 24 points, 17 rebounds, 1 steal and finished the game with a 40 efficiency.
